question: Will Google Gemini be #1 Free App in the US Apple App Store on October 17?
description:
This market will resolve according to the iOS app, ranked #1 in the United States on the iPhone Apple App Store's overall Top Charts under "Free Apps", as of October 17, 2025, at 12:00 PM ET.

To find the overall chart, click "Apps" at the bottom of the US iOS App Store app, scroll down to "Top Free Apps" and click "See All". Then under "Free Apps" in the "Top Charts" section, you'll see the list that will be used as the resolution source to this market (https://apps.apple.com/us/charts/iphone).

question: Israel x Hamas ceasefire cancelled by October 31?
description:
On October 9, Israel and Hamas signed a deal implementing a ceasefire: https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-hamas-agree-gaza-ceasefire-return-hostages-2025-10-09/

This market will resolve to "Yes" if a either Israel or Hamas announce the cancellation of the ongoing ceasefire, or if a consensus of credible reporting confirms that the ceasefire is no longer in effect, by October 31, 2025, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise this market will resolve to "No".

Announcements that one side or another violated the ongoing ceasefire will not be enough to resolve this market to "Yes"; only a definitive announcement by Israel or Hamas, or otherwise a wide consensus of credible reporting that that the ceasefire has been ended, will qualify to resolve this market to "Yes".

The primary solution resolution source will be official information from Hamas or the government of Israel, however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Bitcoin Up or Down - October 11, 8PM ET
description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the close price is greater than or equal to the open price for the BTC/USDT 1 hour candle that begins on the time and date specified in the title. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Down".

The resolution source for this market is information from Binance, specifically the BTC/USDT pair (https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT). The close « C » and open « O » displayed at the top of the graph for the relevant "1H" candle will be used once the data for that candle is finalized.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTC/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: Spread: Oklahoma (-1.5)
description:
In the upcoming college football game, scheduled for October 11 at 3:30 PM ET:

This market will resolve to "Oklahoma" if Oklahoma win the game by 2 or more points.

Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Texas".

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed. If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

This market will resolve to "Up" if the close price is greater than or equal to the open price for the XRP/USDT 1 hour candle that begins on the time and date specified in the title. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Down".

The resolution source for this market is information from Binance, specifically the XRP/USDT pair (https://www.binance.com/en/trade/XRP_USDT). The close « C » and open « O » displayed at the top of the graph for the relevant "1H" candle will be used once the data for that candle is finalized.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance XRP/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

description:

This market will resolve to "Over" if Arizona State and Utah combine to score 48 or more points in this game.

This market will resolve to "Up" if the close price is greater than or equal to the open price for the BTC/USDT 1 hour candle that begins on the time and date specified in the title. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Down".

The resolution source for this market is information from Binance, specifically the BTC/USDT pair (https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT). The close « C » and open « O » displayed at the top of the graph for the relevant "1H" candle will be used once the data for that candle is finalized.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTC/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: Arizona State vs. Utah: O/U 44.5
description:
In the upcoming college football game, scheduled for October 11 at 10:15 PM ET:

This market will resolve to "Over" if Arizona State and Utah combine to score 45 or more points in this game.

If the combined total is less than 45, this market will resolve to "Under".

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed. If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Utah State vs. Hawaii: O/U 57.5
description:
In the upcoming college football game, scheduled for October 11 at 11:59 PM ET:

This market will resolve to "Over" if Utah State and Hawaii combine to score 58 or more points in this game.

If the combined total is less than 58, this market will resolve to "Under".

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed. If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Cubs vs. Brewers
description:
In the upcoming MLB game, scheduled for October 11 at 8:08PM ET:
If the Chicago Cubs win, the market will resolve to “Cubs”.
If the Milwaukee Brewers win, the market will resolve to “Brewers”.
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.
To know when a postponed game will be played, please check the home team's schedule on MLB.com for the listed team and look for the game described as a makeup game.

question: Will the highest temperature in London be 55°F or below on October 12?
description:
This market will resolve to the temperature range that contains the highest temperature recorded at the London City Airport Station in degrees Fahrenheit on 12 Oct '25.

The resolution source for this market will be information from Wunderground, specifically the highest temperature recorded for all times on this day by the Forecast for the London City Airport Station once information is finalized, available here: https://www.wunderground.com/history/daily/gb/london/EGLC.

This market can not resolve to "Yes" until all data for this date has been finalized.

The resolution source for this market measures temperatures to whole degrees Fahrenheit (eg, 21°F). Thus, this is the level of precision that will be used when resolving the market.

Any revisions to temperatures recorded after data is finalized for this market's timeframe will not be considered for this market's resolution.

question: Bitcoin Up or Down - October 12, 6AM ET
description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the close price is greater than or equal to the open price for the BTC/USDT 1 hour candle that begins on the time and date specified in the title. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Down".

The resolution source for this market is information from Binance, specifically the BTC/USDT pair (https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT). The close « C » and open « O » displayed at the top of the graph for the relevant "1H" candle will be used once the data for that candle is finalized.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTC/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: Wuhan Tennis Open: Aryna Sabalenka vs Jessica Pegula
description:
This is a polymarket on the tennis match between Aryna Sabalenka and Jessica Pegula in the Wuhan Tennis Open, scheduled for October 10 at 10:00PM ET.

This market will resolve to 'Sabalenka' if Aryna Sabalenka advances against Jessica Pegula.

This market will resolve to 'Pegula' if Jessica Pegula advances against Aryna Sabalenka.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50.

If the match ends in a walkover (player withdraws before the start and the other advances automatically), this market will resolve in favor of the player(s) who officially advances to the next round.

The primary resolution source will be official information from the WTA Tour. A consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Spread: Celtics (-5.5)
description:
In the upcoming NBA game, scheduled for October 10 at 7:00 PM ET:

This market will resolve to "Celtics" if the Celtics win the game by 6 or more points.

Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Raptors". If the game ends in a tie, this market will resolve to "Raptors".

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed. If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Hyperswap FDV above $500M one day after launch?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Fully Diluted Valuation of Hyperswap's token is greater than the value specified in the title 1 day after launch. Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No."

The token must be actively, publicly transferable and tradable to be considered a launch.

"1 day after launch" is defined as 4:00 PM ET on the calendar day following launch. The resolution source for this market is the most liquid price source available. If Hyperswap (https://hyperswap.exchange/) doesn't launch a token by December 31, 2026, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "No".

question: Celtics vs. Raptors: O/U 221.5
description:
In the upcoming NBA game, scheduled for October 10 at 7:00 PM ET:

This market will resolve to "Over" if the Celtics and Raptors combine to score 222 or more points in this game.

If the combined total is less than 222, this market will resolve to "Under".

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed. If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Hyperswap FDV above $100M one day after launch?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Fully Diluted Valuation of Hyperswap's token is greater than the value specified in the title 1 day after launch. Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No."

The token must be actively, publicly transferable and tradable to be considered a launch.

"1 day after launch" is defined as 4:00 PM ET on the calendar day following launch. The resolution source for this market is the most liquid price source available. If Hyperswap (https://hyperswap.exchange/) doesn't launch a token by December 31, 2026, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "No".

events.title: Hyperswap FDV above ___ one day after launch?
events.description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Fully Diluted Valuation of Hyperswap's token is greater than the value specified in the title 1 day after launch. Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No."

The token must be actively, publicly transferable and tradable to be considered a launch.

"1 day after launch" is defined as 4:00 PM ET on the calendar day following launch. The resolution source for this market is the most liquid price source available. If Hyperswap (https://hyperswap.exchange/) doesn't launch a token by December 31, 2026, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "No".

question: Will Trump’s approval rating be less than 42.5 on October 17 2025?
description:
This market will resolve according to Silver Bulletin's approval rating for Donald Trump on October 17, 2025.

Note that the approval ratings for this date must be finalized before it is considered for this market (namely once the next data point is available, the previous one is finalized).

question: Israel strikes Gaza by October 17?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Israel initiates a drone, missile, or air strike on Gaza soil between October 10, 11:30 AM ET, and October 17, 2025, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purposes of this market, a qualifying "strike" is defined as the use of aerial bombs, drones or missiles (including cruise or ballistic missiles) launched by Israeli military forces that impact Gaza ground territory.

A strike on any area within the terrestrial territory of the Gaza Strip counts, including buffer zones.

Missiles or drones which are intercepted and surface-to-air missile strikes will not be sufficient for a "Yes" resolution regardless of whether they land on Gaza territory or cause damage.

Actions such as artillery fire, small arms fire, FPV or ATGM strikes, ground incursions, naval shelling, cyberattacks, or other operations conducted by Israeli ground operatives will not qualify.

The resolution source will be a consensus of credible reporting.

question: Will Trump say "Israel" or "Israeli" 20+ times during speech to Israeli Parliament on October 13?
description:
Donald Trump is scheduled to address the Israeli Knesset on Monday, October 13, 2025. You can read more about that here:
https://www.timesofisrael.com/trump-said-set-to-arrive-in-israel-monday-morning-for-quickfire-visit-address-knesset/

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Trump says the listed term during his appearance at this event. Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No".

Any usage of the term, regardless of context will count toward the resolution of this market.

Pluralization/possessive of the term will count toward the resolution of this market, however other forms will NOT count.

Instances where the term is used in a compound word will count regardless of context (e.g. joyful is not a compound word for "joy," however "killjoy" is a compounding of the words "kill" and "joy").

If this market requires a specified number of mentions of a person’s first or last name, a full-name mention will count as one mention (e.g., if a market is about “Joe / Biden 5+ times,” a mention of “Joe Biden” will count once).

This market is explicitly Trump's scheduled upcoming address to the Knesset. Speeches, events, or comments that occur outside of this event will not qualify toward this market's resolution. If the event contains a Q&A, it will count toward the resolution of this market.

If this event is definitively cancelled, or otherwise is not aired by October 14, 2025, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source is the video of the event.

question: Bitcoin Up or Down on October 12?
description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for BTC/USDT Oct 11 '25 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is lower than the final "Close" price for the Oct 12 '25 12:00 ET candle.

This market will resolve to "Down" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for BTC/USDT Oct 11 '25 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is higher than the final "Close" price for the Oct 12 '25 12:00 ET candle.

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the BTC/USDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT with "1m" and "Candles" selected on the top bar.

question: Shanghai Rolex Masters: Daniil Medvedev vs Arthur Rinderknech
description:
This is a polymarket on the tennis match between Daniil Medvedev and Arthur Rinderknech in the Shanghai Rolex Masters, scheduled for October 11 at 7:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to 'Medvedev' if Daniil Medvedev advances against Arthur Rinderknech.

This market will resolve to 'Rinderknech' if Arthur Rinderknech advances against Daniil Medvedev.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50.

If the match ends in a walkover (player withdraws before the start and the other advances automatically), this market will resolve in favor of the player(s) who officially advances to the next round.

The primary resolution source will be official information from the ATP Tour. A consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Ningbo Open, Qualification: Tatjana Maria vs Aliaksandra Sasnovich
description:
This is a polymarket on the tennis match between Tatjana Maria and Aliaksandra Sasnovich in the Ningbo Open, Qualification, scheduled for October 11 at 12:30AM ET.

This market will resolve to 'Maria' if Tatjana Maria advances against Aliaksandra Sasnovich.

This market will resolve to 'Sasnovich' if Aliaksandra Sasnovich advances against Tatjana Maria.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50.

If the match ends in a walkover (player withdraws before the start and the other advances automatically), this market will resolve in favor of the player(s) who officially advances to the next round.

The primary resolution source will be official information from the WTA Tour. A consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Solana Up or Down - October 12, 12PM ET
description:

The resolution source for this market is information from Binance, specifically the SOL/USDT pair (https://www.binance.com/en/trade/SOL_USDT). The close « C » and open « O » displayed at the top of the graph for the relevant "1H" candle will be used once the data for that candle is finalized.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance SOL/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: Ningbo Open, Qualification: Yulia Putintseva vs Katarzyna Kawa
description:
This is a polymarket on the tennis match between Yulia Putintseva and Katarzyna Kawa in the Ningbo Open, Qualification, scheduled for October 11 at 2:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to 'Putintseva' if Yulia Putintseva advances against Katarzyna Kawa.

This market will resolve to 'Kawa' if Katarzyna Kawa advances against Yulia Putintseva.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50.

If the match ends in a walkover (player withdraws before the start and the other advances automatically), this market will resolve in favor of the player(s) who officially advances to the next round.

The primary resolution source will be official information from the WTA Tour. A consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Binance 1 minute candle for BTC/USDT 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) on the date specified in the title has a final “Close” price higher than the price specified in the title. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the BTC/USDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT with “1m” and “Candles” selected on the top bar.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTC/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

Price precision is determined by the number of decimal places in the source.

question: Ningbo Open, Qualification: Talia Gibson vs Lucia Bronzetti
description:
This is a polymarket on the tennis match between Talia Gibson and Lucia Bronzetti in the Ningbo Open, Qualification, scheduled for October 11 at 12:30AM ET.

This market will resolve to 'Gibson' if Talia Gibson advances against Lucia Bronzetti.

This market will resolve to 'Bronzetti' if Lucia Bronzetti advances against Talia Gibson.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50.

If the match ends in a walkover (player withdraws before the start and the other advances automatically), this market will resolve in favor of the player(s) who officially advances to the next round.

The primary resolution source will be official information from the WTA Tour. A consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

This market will resolve according to the final "Close" price of the Binance 1 minute candle for XRP/USDT 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) on the date specified in the title. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the XRP/USDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/XRP_USDT with "1m" and "Candles" selected on the top bar.

If the reported value falls exactly between two brackets, then this market will resolve to the higher range bracket.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance XRP/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the XRP/USDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/XRP_USDT with “1m” and “Candles” selected on the top bar.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance XRP/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

Price precision is determined by the number of decimal places in the source.

question: Ethereum Up or Down - October 10, 3:00PM-3:15PM ET
description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the Ethereum price at the end of the time range specified in the title is greater than or equal to the price at the beginning of that range. Otherwise, it will resolve to "Down".
The resolution source for this market is information from Chainlink, specifically the ETH/USD data stream available at https://data.chain.link/streams/eth-usd.
Please note that this market is about the price according to Chainlink data stream ETH/USD, not according to other sources or spot markets.

description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the Bitcoin price at the end of the time range specified in the title is greater than or equal to the price at the beginning of that range. Otherwise, it will resolve to "Down".
The resolution source for this market is information from Chainlink, specifically the BTC/USD data stream available at https://data.chain.link/streams/btc-usd.
Please note that this market is about the price according to Chainlink data stream BTC/USD, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: Will Powell say "Inflation" 25+ times during speech on October 14?
description:
Jerome Powell is scheduled to deliver a speech at the National Association for Business Economics (NABE) entitled "Economic Outlook and Monetary Policy" at October 14, 2025, 12:20 PM ET (see https://www.federalreserve.gov/newsevents/calendar.htm).

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Powell says the listed term during his appearance at this event. Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No".

Any usage of the term regardless of context will count toward the resolution of this market.

Pluralization/possessive of the term will count toward the resolution of this market, however other forms will NOT count.

Instances where the term is used in a compound word will count regardless of context (e.g. joyful is not a compound word for "joy," however "killjoy" is a compounding of the words "kill" and "joy").

If this market requires a specified number of mentions of a person’s first or last name, a full-name mention will count as one mention (e.g., if a market is about “Joe / Biden 5+ times,” a mention of “Joe Biden” will count once).

This market is explicitly about the scheduled remarks at the specified event on October 14. Speeches, events, or comments that occur outside of this event will not qualify toward this market's resolution. If the event contains a Q&A, or a 1 on 1 immediately following the speech, it will count toward the resolution of this market.

If the appearance has not aired in its entirety by October 14, 2025, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve based on what has aired up to that point. If no appearance is aired by this time, or if it is otherwise definitively cancelled by Jerome Powell, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source is the audio/video of the listed event.

Jerome Powell is scheduled to deliver a speech at the National Association for Business Economics (NABE) entitled "Economic Outlook and Monetary Policy" at October 14, 2025, 12:20 PM ET (see https://www.federalreserve.gov/newsevents/calendar.htm).

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Powell says the listed term during his appearance at this event. Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No".

Any usage of the term regardless of context will count toward the resolution of this market.

Pluralization/possessive of the term will count toward the resolution of this market, however other forms will NOT count.

Instances where the term is used in a compound word will count regardless of context (e.g. joyful is not a compound word for "joy," however "killjoy" is a compounding of the words "kill" and "joy").

If this market requires a specified number of mentions of a person’s first or last name, a full-name mention will count as one mention (e.g., if a market is about “Joe / Biden 5+ times,” a mention of “Joe Biden” will count once).

This market is explicitly about the scheduled remarks at the specified event on October 14. Speeches, events, or comments that occur outside of this event will not qualify toward this market's resolution. If the event contains a Q&A, or a 1 on 1 immediately following the speech, it will count toward the resolution of this market.

If the appearance has not aired in its entirety by October 14, 2025, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve based on what has aired up to that point. If no appearance is aired by this time, or if it is otherwise definitively cancelled by Jerome Powell, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source is the audio/video of the listed event.

question: Bitcoin Up or Down - October 10, 3:30PM-3:45PM ET
description:

The resolution source for this market is information from Chainlink, specifically the BTC/USD data stream available at https://data.chain.link/streams/btc-usd.
Please note that this market is about the price according to Chainlink data stream BTC/USD, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: Will the MetaDAO proposal to engage in a $6M OTC deal pass?
description:

question: Spread: Tennessee (-10.5)
description:
In the upcoming college football game, scheduled for October 11 at 4:15 PM ET:

This market will resolve to "Tennessee" if Tennessee win the game by 11 or more points.

Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Arkansas".

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed. If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

events.title: Arkansas vs. Tennessee
events.description:
In the upcoming CFB game, scheduled for October 11 at 4:15PM ET:

If the Arkansas win, the market will resolve to "Arkansas".

If the Tennessee win, the market will resolve to "Tennessee".

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.

If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Israel strikes Gaza by October 31?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Israel initiates a drone, missile, or air strike on Gaza soil between October 10, 11:30 AM ET, and October 31, 2025, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purposes of this market, a qualifying "strike" is defined as the use of aerial bombs, drones or missiles (including cruise or ballistic missiles) launched by Israeli military forces that impact Gaza ground territory.

A strike on any area within the terrestrial territory of the Gaza Strip counts, including buffer zones.

Missiles or drones which are intercepted and surface-to-air missile strikes will not be sufficient for a "Yes" resolution regardless of whether they land on Gaza territory or cause damage.

Actions such as artillery fire, small arms fire, FPV or ATGM strikes, ground incursions, naval shelling, cyberattacks, or other operations conducted by Israeli ground operatives will not qualify.

The resolution source will be a consensus of credible reporting.

question: Spread: Nebraska Cornhuskers (-7.5)
description:
In the upcoming college football game, scheduled for October 11 at 3:30 PM ET:

This market will resolve to "Nebraska Cornhuskers" if Nebraska Cornhuskers win the game by 8 or more points.

Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Maryland Terrapins".

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed. If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Will Trump pardon CZ by October 31?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Changpeng Zhao receives a presidential pardon, commutation, or reprieve from Donald Trump by October 31, 2025, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If it becomes impossible for Trump to issue a federal pardon, commutation, or reprieve within this market's timeframe, it may immediately resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for whether a person is pardoned or not will be official information from the US government, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Almaty Open, Qualification: James Duckworth vs Saba Purtseladze
description:
This is a polymarket on the tennis match between James Duckworth and Saba Purtseladze in the Almaty Open, Qualification, scheduled for October 11 at 3:30AM ET.

This market will resolve to 'Duckworth' if James Duckworth advances against Saba Purtseladze.

This market will resolve to 'Purtseladze' if Saba Purtseladze advances against James Duckworth.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50.

If the match ends in a walkover (player withdraws before the start and the other advances automatically), this market will resolve in favor of the player(s) who officially advances to the next round.

The primary resolution source will be official information from the ATP Tour. A consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

This market will resolve to "Utah" if Utah win the game by 10 or more points.

question: Bitcoin Up or Down - October 10, 9:00PM-9:15PM ET
description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the Bitcoin price at the end of the time range specified in the title is greater than or equal to the price at the beginning of that range. Otherwise, it will resolve to "Down".
The resolution source for this market is information from Chainlink, specifically the BTC/USD data stream available at https://data.chain.link/streams/btc-usd.
Please note that this market is about the price according to Chainlink data stream BTC/USD, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: Will The Life of a Showgirl’s second-week album sales be under 300k?
description:
This market will resolve according to how many sales Taylor Swift's new album 'The Life of a Showgirl' has for the chart date, October 17, of  'The Life of a Showgirl' second week, on the finalized version of hitsdailydouble.com's "HITS TOP 50" list. 

This market will resolve according to the figure in the column titled "Activity" once the named list is finalized.

If the reported value falls exactly between two brackets, then this market will resolve to the higher range bracket.

The primary resolution source for this market will be the "HITS TOP 50" list found at https://hitsdailydouble.com/sales_plus_streaming.

If the chart specified herein is rendered permanently unavailable or does not list 'The Life of a Showgirl', another credible resolution source may be chosen.
